body_html:
@martinwicke as @yifeif said it were checking against a minimum version and nothing about maximum. In my case it didn't work with any version higher than 0.5.1 (or 0.5.2)
It looks like there are some differences in environment settings within bazel scope... could be this a problem:

Release 0.5.3
Incompatible changes:

deprecate --python2_path and --python3_path flags for the
new --python_path flag; introduce --python_top flag for using
the new py_runtime rule.
....

I can't reproduce test with version 0.5.2 at the moment, but 0.5.3 and 0.5.4 don't work for python package generation.

body:
@martinwicke as @yifeif said it were checking against a minimum version and nothing about maximum. In my case it didn't work with any version higher than 0.5.1 (or 0.5.2)
It looks like there are some differences in environment settings within bazel scope... could be this a problem: 
```
Release 0.5.3
Incompatible changes:

deprecate --python2_path and --python3_path flags for the
new --python_path flag; introduce --python_top flag for using
the new py_runtime rule.
....
```
I can't reproduce test with version 0.5.2 at the moment, but 0.5.3 and 0.5.4 don't work for python package generation.
